titles.title: Digital Overseas Voting Act

To amend the Uniformed and Overseas Citizens Absentee Voting Act to permit absent uniformed services voters and overseas voters to submit the Federal write-in absentee ballot under such Act to the appropriate State election official by mail, electronic mail, or fax.
Digital Overseas Voting Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Digital Overseas Voting Act
This bill requires all states to allow an absent uniformed services voter or overseas voter to submit a federal write-in absentee ballot by email or fax.
